mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECRUITMENT(RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_TITLE, RECRUITMENT_CONTENT, RECRUITMENT_WRITER, RECRUITMENT_START, RECRUITMENT_END, RECRUITMENT_LOCATION ) VALUES(SEQ_RECRUITMENT.NEXTVAL, #{recruitmentTitle}, #{recruitmentContent}, #{recruitmentWriter}, #{recruitmentStart}, #{recruitmentEnd}, #{recruitmentLocation} )

INSERT INTO RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT(RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_NO, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_CHANGE, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_PATH, RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_RECRUITMENT_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_RECRUITMENT.CURRVAL, #{rAttachmentOrigin}, #{rAttachmentChange}, #{rAttachmentPath}, #{rAttachmentLevel})
